about_the_game:
Support DeadEagle with the Supporters Edition DLC


Thank you for considering the Supporters Edition DLC for Stewart the Fox. By purchasing this DLC, you're directly supporting the ongoing development efforts of DeadEagle & Spitfire-Games. Your support is immensely valued, especially as Stewart the Fox is entirely free to play.

What's Included:

  • King Stewart: Transform your Stewart into King Stewart! By purchasing this Supporters Edition DLC, you receive three in-game items: Stewart's Legendary Hat, Stewart's Cheesy Hammer, and the Stewart Gold skin!
  • Development Support: Your purchase goes directly towards fueling ongoing development efforts and enables the creation of even more engaging experiences in the future.

Visit the Skins menu in the main-menu to equip the King Stewart Skin

Thank you for being a vital part of our development journey. Your support makes a significant difference!
